actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide a supplemental payment to assist agricultural producers in mitigating increasing input costs, including energy and fertilizer costs.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make a supplemental payment (equal to the direct payment that the producer received for a 2005 crop) to assist agricultural producers in mitigating increasing input costs, including energy and fertilizer costs.

titles.title: A bill to provide a supplemental payment to assist agricultural producers in mitigating increasing input costs, including energy and fertilizer costs.
